Objective: Land on Treasure spaces 3 times. After that, landing on Treasure spaces gives you 5 extra points.
Land on Aether spaces once. After that, you can also roll on the -aether table when passing the Start space.
Have your points reach 0. After that, the first time you are knocked out, you come back with 30 points immediately.
Participate in 10 duels. After that, you gain +1 to all of your attack rolls.
Land on Summon spaces 3 times. After that, landing on Summon spaces gives you 5 points.
Land on Diversion spaces 3 times. After that, landing on Diversion spaces gives you 5 points.
Gain a total of 15 points from duels. After that, winning a duel gives you 5 extra points.
Win 7 duels. After that, winning a duel gives you 5 extra points.
Pass the Start space 2 times. After that, healing spaces give you 1 extra point.
Roll a 0 for movement 3 times. After that, gain +2 to all movement rolls.
Knock out a player with a duel. After that, knocking out a player gives you 15 points.
Land on the Start space. After that, passing the start space gives you 30 points instead of 20.
Lose a total of 15 points from duels. After that, losing a duel gives you 5 points.
Lose 7 duels. After that, losing a duel gives you 5 points.
Gamble at the Start space twice. After that, you can gamble at the Start space for free instead of gaining points.
